dialogues.text: We will not be able to do this as smoothly as I had hoped. Luckily, you carry your Sonic Katana
You will have to use it in order to activate the levers and kill enemies
(Press 'LShift' to use the Sonic Katana to attack in an area in front of you, harming enemies and interacting with the environment)
Remember to rest on any resting points you see, in order to heal and refill your first aid kits, which you can use at any time to heal up.
(Pres 'W' near a resting point to rest, and use a first aid kit to heal with 'E')
